subject: French Open (Tennis)
Tennis
lead_paragraph: Andy Roddick finally made his way into the fourth round of the French Open, and Serena Williams scrapped and slugged her way to a three-set victory in a match rich in subplots and acrimony.
snippet: Andy Roddick finally made his way into the fourth round of the French Open, and Serena Williams scrapped and slugged her way to a three-set victory in a match rich in subplots and acrimony.
